project1.title: Pomodoro
project1.desc: Pomodoro is an interactive web application designed to enhance user productivity by applying the Pomodoro technique. The application offers a user-friendly timer divided into 25-minute work intervals and 5-minute breaks. Additionally, users can choose from a variety of background music to create a pleasant and focused work atmosphere.
project1.html: HTML: Structuring the user interface with semantic HTML for better accessibility.
project1.css: CSS: Styling the application with responsive design that looks good across different devices.
project1.js: JavaScript: Implementing the timer and music control to help users during work sessions.
project1.conclusion: Conclusion: This project demonstrates my ability to develop a functional and user-friendly application that optimizes time management using the Pomodoro technique.

project2.title: R24 Frontend Test Task
project2.desc: An interactive frontend project that implements a web application with a minimalist Apple-inspired design. It features drag-and-drop functionality, material selection, and dynamic data input.
project2.html: Vue.js: Creating interactive and dynamic components for a seamless user experience.
project2.css: CSS: Apple-inspired design with rounded corners, animations, and a clean user interface.
project2.js: JavaScript: Implementing drag-and-drop functionality and dynamic data input.
project2.conclusion: Conclusion: This project showcases my ability to build complex interactive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like Vue.js.
